Text:
Amazon killed Lincoln so we could have Kindles?  I never knew.  

Talk about advance planning - that Bezos is way ahead of his time.
When I try to read the files on my Kindle it says that this is licensed to a different person and it cannot display the files. How do I fix it?
What is the PID for this book so we all can remove the DRM?  Thx.
Or you remove the DRM and repost it
Download kindle drm removal here on TPB
this one is useless. you need the PID number to remove the DRM, and its not given here.
